hadiths.text: Narrated AbuAyyub al-Ansari: When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) ate or drank, he said: "Praise be to Allah Who has given food and drink and made it easy to swallow, and provided an exit for it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ الرَّجُلُ إِذَا طَعِمَ
chapter.eng-name: What a man should say after eating
